title: Activist Investor Mantle Ridge Has $1.8 Billion Stake in Dollar Tree
sub_head: The investor is said to seek improvement in Family Dollar, price strategy
body:
Activist investor Mantle Ridge LP has at least a $1.8 billion stake in Dollar Tree Inc. and plans to push the discount retailer to take action to boost its share price, according to people familiar with the matter.
Mantle Ridge believes Dollar Tree could ignite its underperforming shares by making improvements to its Family Dollar chain and its pricing strategy, the people said.
